I hope you've been getting something out of the Samurai Archives Podcast so=
 far -- next we'll be covering the Sengoku period, and will be hosting a Q&=
A, so send your questions along, and we'll answer them on air.  For anyone =
not familiar with the Sengoku period, remember those sweeping epic Samurai =
battles you saw in movies and Anime?  That's the Sengoku period, populated =
by such famous figures as Oda Nobunaga, Takeda Shingen, Uesugi Kenshin, and=
 a ton of others.  So send along your questions, easy, basic, complex, or h=
ard, doesn't matter, and we'll do our best to answer them!

http://samuraia=
rchives.podbean.com/
